description: As a Machine Learning Engineer, I develop ML and AI solutions designed to integrate into complex, production-grade systems used across international projects. I work at the intersection of model development, data pipeline engineering and system integration, focusing on scalability, reliability and reproducibility.
points: **End-to-end ML model development** for operational systems, from design and training to containerized deployment and exposure through REST APIs.
**Design and implementation of data pipelines** for retrieval, selection and preprocessing, now adopted across the department and significantly improving automation and data preparation time.
**Cross-team collaboration** to deliver integrated workflows combining ML, data engineering and software components in coherent, scalable architectures.
**Mentoring and direction of a junior ML resource** to support the full development process, accelerate onboarding, and enhance team execution capacity.
**Technical management activities** in international projects as a subject-matter expert for documentation, architecture contributions and solution alignment with project requirements.

description: During my internship, I contributed to the development of ML solutions and internal tools supporting geospatial data processing and model experimentation.
points: **Developed and evaluated multiple ML models** for classification and image segmentation on complex geospatial datasets, using data preprocessing and feature extraction techniques to improve performance.
**Deployment of ML prototypes** into reproducible and maintainable tools adopted by the team.
